author: A_Brickset_user
title: Nice little Robots
review: I bought this set,while I was for vacation in Italy. It was very expensive 18.50â‚¬, which is about 23$ but it was worth it.The Idea Book gives Ideas and Instructions for 32 Models out of the 219 parts.Another nice fact is, that you can have up to 3 Models at the same time.And there are no juniorized parts in that set.Mostly 1980ish to early 1990ish parts.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great !!
review: I always wanted this set since it was released in 2003.. but it was the release of the x-pods that got me into this mecha-style lego... THIS is the way to build robots, not bionicle!! ( I HÆTE bionicle ) I got this, the green robot from the xpods, the REALLY big titan xp, and a duracell battery pack lego robot set

author: A_Brickset_user
title: What a great set!
review:
I bought this set a year ago and I'm still enjoy looking at it. (Right, after building it, i won't tear them up to construct other models. A bit wasting, I know).

Nice display set together with 4099 (Robobots), 4508 (Titan Xp) and 4881 (Robo Platoon).

Play on.

author: legoguysw
title: Forget the build, look at the parts!
review:
Exactly what the title says. You get loads of small, useful parts in this set that will serve your Lego collection forever.
Okay, maybe hat last sentence was pushing it, but there are some great parts just waiting to be used in that box. So, the 'Robots' are nothing special, it's the parts that make this so good!
I've only given it a 4 because a 5 would mean it is a must buy superb 10/10 set, which obviously it ain't.

author: modena
title: Fantastic parts!
review:
This set had so many and rare parts, it will really give you fun!

Pros:

  • Lots of parts!
  • Rare bricks!
  • Lots of colours!
  • Lots of detail!

Cons:

  • No numbers for parts (If they brake, I can't find the number so I can order new bricks)

Overall:

This was such a nice set; I remember when I was small, I always used to go and wreck cars and houses with these... There are lots of parts, so you can easily create your customized model!
If you find this set, you will probably have a nice time building, and when you are bored, build satellites with these rare parts!
